formatted_address: 11 Bidadari Park Dr, #01-55 Facing Outside next to Bidadari community club, Singapore 367803
name: OLLA Coffee (The Woodleigh Mall)

reviews.text:
Love the coffee! A sip of it instantly transported me back to Melbourne where a strong coffee culture thrives. The cafe uses Nylon coffee beans.
There are 2 seats with electric sockets that allow working on laptop while enjoying good coffee possible :)

If you allow âœ… me, itâ€™s almost like drinking Chinese ğŸ§§medicine. The Chai and Spices were just too overwhelming for me to the point, I couldnâ€™t appreciate the coffee. Skip!

I will be back to try the rest of the brew, perhaps a more conventional Latte or Americano?
The price is slightly higher than expected, but I loved the ambiance of the cafe. It offers pet-friendly outdoor seating and is just a few steps away from Bidadari Park and Woodleigh MRT.

I only had food and didnâ€™t have any drinks.

The waffle tasted a hint of orange, but didnâ€™t have the eggy taste. I wasnâ€™t impressed.

The toast with poached eggs and avocado was decent.

Overall I didnâ€™t find it to be good value for money for food. However, it is cosy place for a drink.

OLLAâ€”the name has a European ring to it. I was instantly drawn in by the coffee, the cozy atmosphere, and the soft, soothing music playing in the background.

Itâ€™s a small cafÃ©, quiet and wonderfully relaxingâ€”perfect for a peaceful break.

I happened to pass by and was pleasantly surprised by how much I enjoyed the coffee. One sip of that rich, roasty flavor, and I was hooked.

Thank you OLLA.
